content:
<rule id="quarkus-jsonp-00010" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <dependency artifactId="jakarta.json" groupId="org.glassfish"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="Replace the 'jakarta.json' dependency with Quarkus 'quarkus-jsonp' extension">
                    <message>
                        Replace the `org.glassfish:jakarta.json` dependency with the Quarkus dependency `io.quarkus:quarkus-jsonp`  
                        No specific guide is available.
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://quarkus.io/guides/" title="Quarkus - Guide"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
